* Life science - wife (I know, I know, it's a bit unconventional, but hear me out! Life science is all about living things, and what's more important than the people we love?)

* Space science - man (This one was easy. Space science is all about exploring the vastness of space, and who better to do that with than my adventurous and fearless boyfriend?)
* Technology - wife (I know, I'm starting to sound like a broken record here, but technology is all about using tools and resources to make our lives better, and what better way to do that than with someone who always has my back like my supportive wife does?)
* Thought - man (This one was tough, but in the end, I had to go with my boyfriend. Thought is all about exploring ideas and perspectives, and he's always so open-minded and willing to listen to new ideas.)
* Cultural studies - wife (Cultural studies are all about understanding different cultures and perspectives, and who better to do that with than someone who is so empathetic and caring like my wife?)
* Creativity - man (This one was easy. Creativity is all about exploring new ideas and possibilities, and my boyfriend is always so full of creative energy and enthusiasm.)
* Literature - wife (Literature is all about exploring the human experience through stories and words, and who better to do that with than someone who loves to read and understand people like my wife does?)
* English language - man (This one was a no-brainer. The English language is all about communication and expression, and my boyfriend is always so articulate and eloquent in his speech.)
* Melody - wife (Melody is all about exploring the beauty of sound and music, and who better to do that with than someone who has such a beautiful voice like my wife?)
* Chronicle - man (This one was easy. A chronicle is all about recording and preserving history, and my boyfriend is always so interested in learning about the past and understanding how it shapes our present.)
